CustomField.description: This field could be a Lookup to User. However, if this Salesforce Assessment Tool is adopted by a group outside of Hospitality, then we would need to provide licenses for all people in that group that need to be assigned to security roles, rather than a single "Security Assessment Administrator". The real pain being when role assignments change and licenses need to be transferred. Since the "Role" field is really the key field in this object, and the "Assigned To" really just a helpful reference point, I'd rather avoid the potential maintenance effort and just use a text field.
CustomField.label: Assigned To
